title: Apocalypse of Meaning - Jordan Peterson & Frens
description:
Clip Distillate of the Opening Remarks from a September 2021 Zoom between four men of some renown. 

Sources:
New:  /watch?v=FCvQsqSCWjA
Old:  /watch?v=WCpVa8jgcLA

Here's a Discord for people who don't hate me: https://discord.gg/P6c3UYZ
Here's a Patreon for people who want to encourage me: https://www.patreon.com/grimgriz

https://grimgriz.substack.com/
